Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Dante', 3: "And that's that. Wasn't so tough after all.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Thanks to Dante and Vergil's overwhelming power in their transformed states, the group arrives safely at the foot of the Babel Tower."}

{1: '1', 3: 'There appears to be some kind of mystical barrier before the tower. The Hetero-Creatures grow eerily still, their attacks ceasing entirely as if bound by some unseen command.', 4: '1', 5: '2', 6: '3'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Their attacks have stopped. Is it because there's no need to continue?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "An open invitation... Very confident of the Mirror Demon. The path ahead won't be an easy one, it seems.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'The towering gates of Babel stand wide open—a gaping maw, demonic and foreboding, as though inviting the guests to step into the abyss.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Dante stretches leisurely on the spot, speaking with effortless confidence.'}

{2: 'Dante', 3: "Either way, moving forward is our only meaningful option. Don't think anyone here wants to turn back and swat more of those pesky bats, right? Bug extermination can be a real buzzkill.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'With that, Dante shrugs his shoulders and takes the lead through the gateway.'}
{3: "The Mirror Demon, now in full control of Thomas' body, watches coldly as the team steps into its domain."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mirror Demon', 3: 'Ordinary Hetero-Creatures can only achieve so far... as expected.', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Mirror Demon', 3: 'However, a special surprise awaits you next.', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Mirror Demon', 3: 'By the time you reach the top, how much strength will you have left to face me?', 4: '18'}
{3: 'The gates of the Babel Tower swing shut behind the group, cutting off the clamor of Hetero-Creatures outside.'}

{3: 'As the last sliver of daylight vanishes, the interior is left in near-darkness, illuminated only by the erratic flicker of candlelight and the dim, colored glow of arched stained-glass windows. Looking around, a hollow chill lingers in the air.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Dante', 3: 'Gotta say, the owner of this tower really went all out on the decor.', 4: '1'}
{3: "The tower's vast, circular chamber stretches before you, its perimeter lined with identical curved doorways spaced at even intervals. There's no visible path upward."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'These doors... do we need to investigate them one by one?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'The path upward must be behind one of these doors.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'With that, Dante casually opens a door beside him.'}
{1: '1', 3: "The air suddenly falls silent. Bullets are chambered, blades unsheathed—the team's vigilance reaches its peak in this moment.", 4: '19', 5: '20', 6: '21'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Even Dante catches himself, realizing his earlier actions were quite rash.'}
{1: '1', 3: "As the door creaks open, a hazy mirror appears before everyone. Dante's silhouette, framed against the doorway, twists eerily in the reflection.", 4: '1', 5: '2', 6: '3'}
{3: 'He steps closer, inspecting the mirror, only to find nothing and turn back to the rest of you.'}
{3: 'Just then, the shatter of glass splits the air behind him.'}
{1: '1', 3: "A ghost of a grin flickers across Dante's face as he draws Ebony and Ivory, quickly spinning around to take aim."}

{3: 'Phantom-blue energy swirls and solidifies into Mirage Blades, hurling toward the Hetero-Creature as it claws free from the shattered mirror. The blades strike true, pinning it firmly to the wall.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Dante', 3: "C'mon, you know I could've handled that.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vergil', 3: "I simply don't want to hear that word from you.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Is it some kind of magical spell?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "At these words, Alpha in the distance can't help but cast curious glances at Dante and Vergil."}
{2: 'Dante', 3: "Listen, guys, you got it all wrong. There's no magic spell like that.", 4: '1'}
{3: "The half-demon brothers have already demonstrated various extraordinary abilities, piquing everyone's curiosity."}
{2: "I've been meaning to ask about your transformation...", 3: '160'}
{2: 'Dante', 3: "Oh, that? That's our Sin Devil Trigger form.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Dante', 3: 'After all, Vergil and I are half-demons, you know.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The group continues to open doors one by one, eliminating any Hetero-Creatures that appear behind them while communicating, until an upward staircase is finally found.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Just then, Vergil steps in front of Liv.'}
{3: 'His warning comes not a second too soon. A blood-curdling howl rips through the air, and a blur of black shadow explodes from the curved staircase, lunging over with terrifying speed.'}
{3: 'But a red figure moves even faster. A greatsword cleaves through the air, striking the Hetero-Creature mid-way and hurling it back with brutal force.'}
